eng_before: and held it up for [Jesus] to drink.
and he tried to reconcile them,
he could bring them as prisoners
someone to lead [him] by the hand.

eng_after: that they had come to believe
to do the Jews a favor,
we had sailed across the open sea
we had moved along the coast

eng_before: we have already made the charge
I would not have been mindful of
I would not have been aware of
